results.title: Taking blood pressure
results.creator_credit: United States. Navy and Chicago Film Laboratory
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Care of the sick and injured”.
Shows how to use blood pressure equipment, how to locate an artery, and other matters connected with the obtaining of a blood pressure reading.

results.title: Taking action
results.creator_credit: TV Ed Productions and James Mann
results.brief_description: This video has been prepared to assist and challenge people in positions of responsibility in schools to provide active and supportive leadership to staff by identifying issues of concern; creating openings for discussion; and taking action in creative, caring and supportive ways. Presents three case studies showing typical school situations in which work performance and organisational issues affect staff relations.

results.title: Taking a time study
results.creator_credit: Gerald Cookson, Kinocraft and Stephen Clarkson
results.brief_description: Illustrates the basic techniques for taking a time study. The method illustrated has been agreed upon by the representatives of management and trade unions and is recommended as sound basic training for trainee work study officers. Valuable for showing to people whose work is likely to be the subject of work measurement.

results.title: Taken
results.creator_credit: Libby Porter, Cinemedia, XY2, Elisabeth Anne Green and Hayley Cloake
results.brief_description: When Sophie finds a message on her answering machine from recently separated husband, Michael, she strikes an unlikely alliance with his ‘errand boy’, Jason. Cast includes Kerry Armstrong, Samuel Johnston and David Michod.

results.title: Take your choice
results.creator_credit: Town and Country Productions and Bill Latto
results.brief_description: Presented by Heinz, this documentary suggests that boredom and juvenile delinquency can be alleviated by introducing young adults to the organised activities of the Boy Scouts and Girl Guides Associations. Shows a range of activities available including camping, orienteering, water sports and rock climbing. Also shows the various volunteer programs that these associations support.

results.title: Take the bus
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “B.P. Road Safety”
Drinking and driving are a bad combination. Shows examples of things that can happen when the driver has had a “few” at the local hotel. Stresses that it is better to “take the bus” after drinking and so avoid accidents which can happen to the driver, his car and anything that gets in his way.

results.title: Take off
results.brief_description: A compilation of some of the best footage from the film “Ski the outer limits.” Skiers leap, twist, somersault, twirl and descend in successive multiple images. An innovative skier uses short skis to perform tricks that would not be possible on conventional skis.
